name: TheAtlantic
text: "In a world where Twitter is but one of many megaphones at public figures’ disposal, the supposed benefit or efficacy of removing such content is debatable," @evelyndouek writes: https://t.co/OXB1Los425

name: TheAtlantic
text: "While Andrew Cuomo was benefiting from heart-string-tugging segments on CNN, his state was struggling … Journalism that truly aims to restore trust in media would hold Cuomo to account for these missteps," argues @GrahamDavidA: https://t.co/uUS5aHdvKt

name: TheAtlantic
text: What happens if the United States pulls out of the WHO during the pandemic? Listen to The Atlantic's "Social Distance" podcast: https://t.co/6ecOGqsCej

name: TheAtlantic
text: The widely watched videos of people proudly refusing to wear face masks are outrageous. They are also misleading, @megangarber writes: https://t.co/GknNcJKCIp
